name: カゼイオン
description: Sitting atop its fiery armor, カゼイオン is a warrior-like pokemon that dwells in desert-like environments. It uses its powerful aura to ward off predators, while defending its territory with the devastating ability of 炎の槍. In addition, カゼイオン has the unique ability to shoot flaming arrows of やけどの矢. It can often be found patrolling the hot sands, looking for any challengers that may cross its path.
image_prompt: カゼイオン::0 a mythical fire-type pokemon::2.5, wearing fiery armor, in a desert environment, lava texture background, anime sketch --niji --ar 3:2
